summary: An unused model named \"Wingless Dragon\" was included with Dragonborn, I managed to get it to work.  Looks kinda bad on its own, but with some elbow grease you can make a pretty decent zombie dragon with it.
descriptionHtml:
An unused model named \"Wingless Dragon\" was included with Dragonborn, I managed to get it to work.  Looks kinda bad on its own, but with some elbow grease you can make a pretty decent zombie dragon with it.

This ESP adds a new non-flying zombie dragon race, near Whiterun.  Modders resource only.  Requires Dragonborn DLC.

The Dragons \"muscle\" texture is horse meat, for those that were wondering.
author: MrCasual
